changes: Added protection against a common error caused by failure to adjust notifications
Added Config.Hud for the ability to hide the hud in the menu
Added Config.DateFormat - the ability to change the format of the entered date.
Added Config.UseLatinAlphabetChecker, for users who use an alphabet other than Latin, like Arabic, Japanese, Cyrillic.
Added Config.UseNationalityOption, if you want to use nationality option with register
Fixed the cursor on the registration menu for servers with a loading screen that supports a mouse cursor on ESX
Improved scaling of â–¶ button for users of 2K, 4K monitors

Improved loading of height range into height label on the UI
Now after wrong input, it doesn't reset previously entered data, only after correct completion of character registration clears inputs (so that the player, when making a mistake, does not have to fill in the fields again)
Added wait for player to load on server so UI doesn't load early
Removed from config file - Config.Multichars and Config.UseCustomSkinCreator for QB-Core
